welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Choctaw, a charming city known for its warm hospitality and rich history. Get ready to discover its hidden gems and immerse yourself in the local culture. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tinker AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tinker AFB Airport serves military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wiley Post Airport houses all commercial flights and amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wiley Post Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sherman Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sherman Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Will Rogers World Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Will Rogers World Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
